detail-doctor.validation-description: Please review the following instructions to confirm your appointment: General medicine consultation.
detail-doctor.validation-indice: If you are sick (cold, fever, cough), please wear a mask in the waiting room and during the consultation.

confirm-pay.description: Please select a payment method to proceed.
confirm-pay.req-description: Are you sure you want to validate this payment request?

confirm-logout.title: Do you confirm logout?
confirm-logout.description: You will need to re-enter your login credentials.

delete-rdv.title: Cancel appointment
delete-rdv.description: Do you really want to cancel this appointment?

confirm-rdv-patient.title: Appointment confirmation
confirm-rdv-patient.note: This appointment will be saved in your patient space.

confirm-delete-sub-admin.title: Do you want to delete this profile?
confirm-delete-sub-admin.description: You have created a new sub-administrator.
